Class fixBackwardsCompatibility

java.lang.Object
utilities.fixBackwardsCompatibility
public class fixBackwardsCompatibility extends Object
Fixes old checkpoints when adding column to the simulation's output

    • reSaveCheckpoint

      public static void reSaveCheckpoint​(String folderName, int Lx, int Lz, double extBx, boolean suppressInternalTransFields, long seed, int newColNum)
      Adds a column to an old saved simulation to make it compatible with newer simulation object. Reads the checkpoint, modifies the object and saves it.
      Parameters:
      folderName - - project name
      Lx - - Number of unit cells in x and in y directions
      Lz - - Number of unit cells in z direction
      extBx - - External Bx magnetic field
      suppressInternalTransFields - - Suppress internal magnetic fields
      seed - - RNG seed
